practice_phrases: I heard that you're going
Oí que vas
I heard that you're going to pay
Oí que vas a pagar
I heard that you're going to the city
Oí que vas a la ciudad
I heard that you're going to run
Oí que vas a correr
I heard that you're going to open the door
Oí que vas a abrir la puerta
I heard that you're going to close the window
Oí que vas a cerrar la ventana
I heard that you're going to sit between the two girls
Oí que vas a sentarte entre las dos chicas
I heard that you're going to run across the grass
Oí que vas a correr a través del césped
I heard that you used to live around here years ago
Oí que solías vivir por aquí hace años
I heard that maybe we should open the door and close the window
Oí que quizás deberíamos abrir la puerta y cerrar la ventana
